import React from"react";import{memo,useCallback,useState}from"react";import{useNavigate}from"react-router-dom";import axios from"axios";import{Box,Divider,Flex,Heading,Input,Stack,Radio,RadioGroup}from"@chakra-ui/react";import{useRecoilState}from"recoil";import{useMessage}from"../../hooks/useMessage";import{EmployeeState,EmployeeAdminState}from"../../contexts/EmployeeState";import{PrimaryButton}from"../atoms/button/PrimaryButton";import{HeaderOnly}from"../templates/layout/HeaderOnly";import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";export const EmployeeResister=/*#__PURE__*/memo(()=>{const navigate=useNavigate();const{showMessage}=useMessage();const[loading,setLoading]=useState(false);const[employeeId,setEmployeeId]=useState("");const[password,setPassword]=useState("");const[isAdmin,setIsAdmin]=useState("0");const[employeeState,setEmployeeState]=useRecoilState(EmployeeState);const[employeeAdminState,setEmployeeAdminState]=useRecoilState(EmployeeAdminState);const onChangeEmployeeId=useCallback(e=>setEmployeeId(e.target.value),[employeeId]);const onChangePassword=useCallback(e=>setPassword(e.target.value),[password]);//API送信関数
const handleSubmit=async e=>{setLoading(true);e.preventDefault();await axios.post("/api/register",{employeeId:employeeId,password:password,isAdmin:parseInt(isAdmin)}).then(res=>{if(res.status===200){showMessage({title:"社員登録が完了しました",status:"info"});navigate("/home");}else{showMessage({title:"社員登録が出来ませんでした",status:"error"});setLoading(false);}}).catch(()=>{showMessage({title:"社員登録が出来ませんでした",status:"error"});setLoading(false);});};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(HeaderOnly,{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Flex,{align:"center",justify:"center",height:"100vh",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Box,{bg:"white",w:"sm",p:4,borderRadius:"md",shadow:"md",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Heading,{as:"h1",size:"lg",textAlign:"center",children:"\u793E\u54E1\u767B\u9332"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Divider,{my:4}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Stack,{spacing:6,py:10,px:10,children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Input,{placeholder:"\u793E\u54E1ID",type:"text",value:employeeId,name:"employeeId",onChange:onChangeEmployeeId}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Input,{placeholder:"\u521D\u671F\u30D1\u30B9\u30EF\u30FC\u30C9",type:"password",value:password,name:"password",onChange:onChangePassword}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(RadioGroup,{onChange:e=>setIsAdmin(e),value:isAdmin,children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Stack,{direction:"row",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Radio,{value:"0",children:"\u4E00\u822C"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Radio,{value:"1",children:"\u7BA1\u7406\u8005"})]})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(PrimaryButton,{disabled:employeeId===""||password==="",loading:loading,onClick:handleSubmit,children:"\u767B\u9332"})]})]})})});});
